comments:
On a new Shell drop a Composite and a Button on the Composite. Hit revert and
the following NPE is thrown in the logs:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.util.EcoreUtil.getExistingAdapter(EcoreUtil.java:76)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.swt.codegen.SWTConstructorDecoderHelper.getMasterExpression(SWTConstructorDecoderHelper.java:313)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.swt.codegen.SWTConstructorDecoderHelper.removeFromModel(SWTConstructorDecoderHelper.java:329)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.java.AbstractExpressionDecoder.deleteFromComposition(AbstractExpressionDecoder.java:341)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.java.AbstractExpressionDecoder.dispose(AbstractExpressionDecoder.java:330)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.model.CodeExpressionRef.dispose(CodeExpressionRef.java:984)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.model.CodeMethodRef.dispose(CodeMethodRef.java:848)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.model.BeanPart.disposeMethod(BeanPart.java:553)
	at org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.model.BeanPart.dispose(BeanPart.java:639)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.java.BDMMerger.removeDeletedBean(BDMMerger.java:1497)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.java.BDMMerger.removeDeletedBeans(BDMMerger.java:1554)
	at org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.java.BDMMerger.merge(BDMMerger.java:92)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.core.JavaSourceTranslator$SharedToLocalUpdater.merge(JavaSourceTranslator.java:373)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.core.JavaSourceTranslator$SharedToLocalUpdater.handleParseable(JavaSourceTranslator.java:419)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.core.JavaSourceTranslator$SharedToLocalUpdater.run(JavaSourceTranslator.java:487)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.java.SnippetParseJob.doRun(SnippetParseJob.java:92)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.util.ReverseParserJob.run(ReverseParserJob.java:56)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:76)

Basically when the Parent and his Child are removed from the source, the snippet
process removes the parent and then the child. If the removal of the parent
happens before that of the child, there wont be any 'masterExpression' on the
parent representing the 'controls' of the Child. Releasing fixes in
SWTConstructorDecoderHelper.
